title: When can I pray sunnah of fajr if I come late to the masjid? - #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: foreign okay so if a person misses the which was supposed to be performed before the fart he has the concession and the right to offer them after the Fajr prayer providing he changes his position or speaks to someone else now the Sunnah is that he finishes his atkar if he wishes and then pray his Sunnah afterwards and also he can wait until the sun rises and praise His Sunnah afterwards both are fine and acceptable in
